CustomField.description: Write the body of the notification. This field support merge fields for user object. Example: {!User.Field__c} messages with values larger than 750 characters will be truncated.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Write the body of the notification. This field support merge fields for user object. Example: {!User.Field__c} messages with values larger than 750 characters will be truncated.
CustomField.label: Body
